statements: UPDATE health_records SET patient_name = 'John Doe', encrypted_record = 'sample encrypted data' WHERE record_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE health_records SET access_type = 'provider', access_key = 'provider_key' WHERE patient_name = 'Jane Smith';
UPDATE health_records SET encrypted_record = 'new encrypted text', access_key = 'new access key' WHERE record_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE health_records SET patient_name = 'John Doe', access_type = 'patient' WHERE record_id = '124e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE patient_records SET encrypted_data = 'new_encrypted_data' WHERE patient_id = 12345;
UPDATE access_control SET access_granted = TRUE, blockchain_access_hash = E'\\x0123456789abcdef' WHERE record_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE patient_records SET encrypted_data = E'\x5468697320697320616e206578616d706c6520636f646520696e204253485f656e636f64656420646174612e', health_provider_id = 101 WHERE patient_id = 12345;

UPDATE access_control SET access_granted = TRUE, blockchain_access_hash = E'\x636f7265206861736820666f722061637365737320636f6e74726f6c20686961726172636879207075626c6963206b657973210a' WHERE record_id = 'c7d9d104-e7dd-4e04-8ee7-15d4bf88c1d8';
UPDATE HealthRecords SET health_data = '{"blood_pressure":120,"heart_rate":80}', encrypted_symmetric_key = E'\\x1234567890abcdef' WHERE record_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Patients SET public_key = E'\\x9876543210fedcba', patient_name = 'Alice Smith' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE HealthRecords SET health_data = '{"weight": 160, "height": 68}' WHERE record_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE HealthcareProviders SET public_key = E'\x03495F1' WHERE provider_id = 'a6a1b9e3-d37d-4e71-93e5-7a21c06d09b0';
UPDATE Patients SET date_of_birth = '1990-05-15' WHERE patient_id = '5dcb7d89-16bf-4764-b28e-f64d915dbe8a';
UPDATE HealthcareProviders SET provider_name = 'New Provider Name' WHERE provider_id = '3adbfed4-4442-4f4b-84cb-5c8553b4e29c';
UPDATE Patients SET encrypted_health_record = 'new value' WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE HealthcareProviders SET provider_name = 'New Provider Name' WHERE provider_id = '789e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE health_records SET health_record_data = 'Updated health record data' WHERE health_record_id = 1;
UPDATE access_logs SET description = 'Accessed by admin' WHERE log_id = 2;
UPDATE health_records SET health_record_data = 'Updated health record data', encryption_key = 'newEncryptionKey' WHERE health_record_id = 123;
UPDATE access_logs SET description = 'Accessed by doctor for review', access_timestamp = '2022-05-25 10:30:00' WHERE log_id = 456;
